attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hereby request the PM to sort out the Dental System,you cannot get in to see most of the dentists in Dorset,for Emergency Service you have to apparently call first for an appointment which i think is ridiculous, how can you have an Emergency Service and have to call first ?? what is the point - surely a first come first served basis is more appropriate for this service ??
